about_the_game:
Video Games Gallery

This Video Game-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Classic to Modern, 8-bit to 4k, this gallery explores all corners of the Video Games industry!

Plug in your RBG, get in your gaming chair and weave some Video Games together!

Contents

The Video Games Gallery unlocks the following images:
  • Handheld
  • Controller
  • Headset
  • Cheat Code
  • Gaming Chair
  • Digital Shop
  • Virtual Reality
  • RGB
  • Joystick
  • Pilot Game
  • Health Bar
  • Cartridge
  • Laser Gun
  • Game Library
  • 80's Driving
  • Fight!
  • Platformers
  • Flight Sim
  • Midnight Launch
  • Level Up
  • Indie Games

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.14
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: WooLoop - Video Games Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
